cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Small Business on March 7, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6441, Women’s Business Centers Improvement Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 13 (Thursday, January 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DAVIDS of Kansas:
H.R. 6441.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
``The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the .
. . general Welfare of the United States; . . .''
[Page H289]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

title: Women’s Business Centers Improvement Act of 2022
